cities.name: Sydney, Australia
cities.description: A vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge.

cities.name: Melbourne, Australia
cities.description: Australiaâ€™s cultural capital, famous for its art, coffee culture and laneways.

cities.name: Brisbane, Australia
cities.description: A sunny, relaxed city located along the Brisbane River with access to the Gold Coast.

cities.name: Tokyo, Japan
cities.description: A massive metropolis blending cutting-edge tech with traditional temples and shrines.

cities.name: Kyoto, Japan
cities.description: Famous for its classical Buddhist temples, gardens, imperial palaces and geisha culture.

cities.name: Osaka, Japan
cities.description: Known for modern architecture, nightlife and street food like takoyaki and okonomiyaki.

cities.name: Rome, Italy
cities.description: The historic capital filled with ancient ruins, the Vatican, and Renaissance art.

cities.name: Florence, Italy
cities.description: Birthplace of the Renaissance, home to masterpieces of art and architecture.

cities.name: Venice, Italy
cities.description: A romantic city built on canals, known for its gondolas and historic charm.

cities.name: Bogota, Colombia
cities.description: The capital city located high in the Andes, offering rich history and museums.

cities.name: Medellin, Colombia
cities.description: A modern city known for its innovation, cable cars, and spring-like climate.

cities.name: Cartagena, Colombia
cities.description: A colorful Caribbean port city with colonial architecture and vibrant culture.

cities.name: Paris, France
cities.description: The romantic capital known for the Eiffel Tower, art museums, and elegant boulevards.

cities.name: Nice, France
cities.description: A coastal city on the French Riviera, famous for beaches, art and Mediterranean charm.

cities.name: Lyon, France
cities.description: Known for its cuisine and historical architecture, located at the junction of two rivers.
